level.text: Written notice of award shall be send to the successful bidder.
Notice of award shall be made available to the public.
Notices of awards of all contracts of ten thousand dollars ($ 10,000), and above shall be published in the “District of Columbia Procurement Digest.”

The contracting officer shall notify unsuccessful bidders promptly that their bids were not accepted, and shall return any bid security furnished with the unsuccessful bids to the unsuccessful bidders.
